title: Apple Watch Series 6 drops to lowest price ever at Amazon
author: tabitha-baker
summary: Save over $100 on the latest Apple Watch
article: Apple Watch deals are becoming more and more frequent as we near Apple's annual launch window for new devices. That means we've been seeing the Apple Watch Series 6 slowly dropping its price tag over the last few months, with a brand new record low hitting the shelves this week.

We're seeing an excellent $134 discount on the 44mm Apple Watch Series 6 today, and while this saving is only available on the Product Red version, the resulting sub-$300 price tag is looking pretty impressive. You'll find the larger Apple Watch available for just $294.99 right now (was $429), a new record that beats the previous cheapest price by over $20.

Amazon frequently offers Apple Watch deals on this model, so that $429 MSRP hasn't been seen since launch. However, before the cost started trickling down in May, this device was still around $399. You'll find an on-page price of $349 here, with an extra $54 off at checkout.

If, however, you're looking for another size or color option you'll find plenty more Apple Watch deals across the range at Amazon right now. The Navy Blue 40mm model is down to $329.99 (was $399.99) and the Silver Apple Watch SE is available for the cheapest price we've seen all year at $249 (was $279).
Get all the information on these discounts just below, with more cheap Apple Watch deals from around the world further down the page.

If Apple is still looking a little pricey, you'll find plenty more Fitbit sales and Samsung Galaxy Watch deals available right now. Plus, keep an eye out in the back to school sales for more discounts.
